wiki.summary: The Next To Me Songfacts reports that this song finds Sandé celebrating the strong, loyal men in her life. She told The Boombox: "I'm lucky that I have had very strong men in my life and who have always been very loyal to me, from my dad, my manager, to my fiancé." Having won the coveted Critics' Choice Gong at the Brit Awards, hugely talented singer-songwriter Emeli Sandé scored a No.2 smash with her third single 'Next To Me' in February 2012.
